first-ngtags-app.title: First ngtags App
first-ngtags-app.preview: [Ngtags](http://ngtags.org) objective is to simplify the creation of [AngularJS](https://angularjs.org) apps. Instead of creating complex _directive_ and _routes_ structure definitions it allows to create them through an `html` like tags self explained and contained. Say hello:  ```html <angular-element name="say-hello">     <template>         <h1

grunt-frontmatter.title: grunt-frontmatter: extracting yaml
grunt-frontmatter.preview: Here I present a new grunt task (yep, another grunt task), the idea of these task is to extract YAML front-matter from files and put them all into one single JSON file. updateable.title: Updateable pattern or flux-for-angular
updateable.preview: This last year Flux had become highly popular, the main reason: an architecture that allows to create large and maintainable applications. In the following video Facebook people explains how and why they developed it:  [![Why FLUX](http://img.youtube.com/vi/nYkdrAPrdcw/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nYkdrAPrdcw&list=PLb0IAmt7-GS188xDYE-u1
